title: Tequendama Falls near Bogata, Colombia
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouace on gray paper
description:
Recto:  The Falls are visible in the back center framed by tree-covered hills.

Verso:  Tree tops fill the foreground, ridges rise in the middleground, and high ranges with a central snow-covered peak rise in the background above the clouds.
name: Drawing
